import React, { Component } from 'react' import './project.scss' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import "react-loader-spinner/dist/loader/css/react-spinner-loader.css"; import YouTube from 'react-youtube'; export class Project extends Component { render() { const opts = { height: '350', width: '400', playerVars: { // https://developers.google.com/youtube/player_parameters autoplay: 0, }, }; return (

Count-Down Timer

A vanilla JS application which count downs to new year using "Date" object

Simple Quiz

A vanilla JS Quiz application using API fetch await to load questions dynamically.

Recipe

A vanilla JS Recipe application to show recipes via keyword or ID search. Favourite recipes can be saved.

Shopping Cart

A Shopping Cart application using ExpressJS, MongoDB, Handlebars. User login and registration validated and uses PassportJS and password hashes and stored in DB using Bcrypt-NodeJS. Prevents the Cross-Site Request Forgery(CSRF) attack by using CSURF module. Success and error messages displayed using connect-flash User can add,update delete and checkout products.

Auctioner

Auction website using ExpressJS, MySQL and Handlebars. Utilised Fashe theme from colorlib. User login and registration validated and uses PassportJS and password hashes and stored in DB using Bcrypt-NodeJS. Only logged-in user can make bids. Prevents the Cross-Site Request Forgery(CSRF) attack by using CSURF module. Success and error messages displayed using connect-flash. User can add,update delete products to sell and also make bids. Password forgot/reset option via sendgrid implemented.

Image Gallery

A PHP application which displays image uploaded by user in gallery

Client Website

A client's website for architectural company

Blurry Tool

A image blur tool using ReactJS.

Reminder

A reminder application in ReactJS

User login and registration validated and uses PassportJS and password hashes and stored in DB using Bcrypt-NodeJS. Prevents the Cross-Site Request Forgery(CSRF) attack by using CSURF module. Success and error messages displayed using connect-flash

Auctioner
Auction website using ExpressJS, MySQL and Handlebars. Utilised Fashe theme from colorlib.
User login and registration validated and uses PassportJS and password hashes and stored in DB using Bcrypt-NodeJS. Only logged-in user can make bids. Prevents the Cross-Site Request Forgery(CSRF) attack by using CSURF module. Success and error messages displayed using connect-flash.
User can add,update delete products to sell and also make bids. Password forgot/reset option via sendgrid implemented.
